statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_locations;
SELECT satellite_name, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_locations WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT satellite_name, altitude FROM satellite_locations WHERE latitude < 0 ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, latitude FROM satellite_locations WHERE longitude > 0 AND altitude < 5000 ORDER BY latitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_locations WHERE altitude > 2000 AND latitude < 0 AND longitude < 0 ORDER BY longitude, altitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_locations WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -90 ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, latitude FROM satellite_locations WHERE altitude > 5000 ORDER BY satellite_name ASC;
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, longitude FROM satellite_locations WHERE satellite_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY satellite_name ASC, longitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_locations WHERE altitude BETWEEN 3000 AND 6000 AND satellite_name LIKE '%Sat%' ORDER BY altitude ASC, satellite_id DESC;
SELECT satellite_id AS ID, latitude, longitude, altitude FROM satellite_locations WHERE longitude > 0 ORDER BY ID ASC, altitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT id, name, status FROM satellites;
SELECT name, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, orbit_radius, launch_date, status FROM satellites WHERE orbit_radius > 1000;
SELECT name, status FROM satellites WHERE orbit_radius > 1000 ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE status = 'Active' AND orbit_radius < 5000 LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE status = 'Inactive' OR orbit_radius IS NULL ORDER BY id;
SELECT s.name, sh.location, sh.timestamp FROM satellites s JOIN satellite_history sh ON s.id = sh.satellite_id WHERE sh.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, launch_date, status FROM satellites WHERE orbit_radius > 500 AND status = 'Active' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Satellites;
SELECT name, launch_date FROM Satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, name, orbit_height_km FROM Satellites WHERE orbit_height_km > 500;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteLocations WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT station_id, name, country FROM GroundStations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Satellites WHERE launch_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY satellite_id DESC;
SELECT name, orbit_height_km FROM Satellites WHERE orbit_height_km > 500 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT s.name, sl.longitude, sl.latitude FROM Satellites s JOIN SatelliteLocations sl ON s.satellite_id = sl.satellite_id WHERE sl.altitude_km > 1000 ORDER BY s.name;

SELECT * FROM Satellites s JOIN SatelliteLocations sl ON s.satellite_id = sl.satellite_id JOIN GroundStations gs ON gs.country = 'USA' WHERE sl.timestamp > '2022-02-01' ORDER BY s.satellite_id ASC, sl.timestamp DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT s.name, gs.name AS ground_station_name FROM Satellites s JOIN SatelliteLocations sl ON s.satellite_id = sl.satellite_id JOIN GroundStations gs ON gs.station_id = sl.location_id WHERE sl.altitude_km < 500 ORDER BY s.name, ground_station_name DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date, orbit_type FROM satellites;
SELECT * FROM tracking_stations WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT station_name, location FROM tracking_stations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, status, update_time FROM satellite_status WHERE status = 'Operational' ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT path_id, satellite_id, path_description, start_date, end_date FROM orbital_paths WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date, orbit_type FROM satellites WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT station_name, location, capacity FROM tracking_stations ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT s.satellite_name, os.status, os.update_time FROM satellites s JOIN satellite_status os ON s.satellite_id = os.satellite_id WHERE os.update_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM tracking_stations;
SELECT s.satellite_name, p.path_description, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM satellites s JOIN orbital_paths p ON s.satellite_id = p.satellite_id WHERE p.end_date > '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE orbit_type = 'Low Earth Orbit';
SELECT name, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE category = 'Communication';
SELECT * FROM satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT name, category FROM satellites WHERE launch_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, name, orbit_type FROM satellites WHERE category IN ('Research', 'Navigation') ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE category = 'Communication' AND orbit_type = 'Geostationary' ORDER BY launch_date DESC
SELECT id, name, category FROM satellites WHERE orbit_type = 'Polar' ORDER BY id
SELECT name, orbit_type FROM satellites WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE category IN ('Weather', 'Observation') ORDER BY name
SELECT id, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE category = 'Navigation'
